```
library(DBI)
library(RMariaDB)
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
library(dbplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)
library(stringr)

# Connect to the MYSQL database containing the data science meetup data.
con <- dbConnect(MariaDB(),host="data607.mysql.database.azure.com", dbname="data607",username="data607@data607", client.flag = CLIENT_COMPRESS, password="!WORK,open,DOWN!")

# Read the "keyword_raw" database table and output the data as Bootstrap table.
keywords <- dbReadTable(con, "keyword_raw")
keywords$Keyword
#keywords %>% kable() %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "basic")

# Read the "events" database table and output the data as a Bootstrap table.
meetup_events <- dbReadTable(con, "events")
meetup_events %>% select(meetup_events, description)
meetup_events %>% kable() %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "basic")
meetup_events$description

termmatrix<-sapply(keywords$Keyword, function(x){str_count(meetup_events$description, x)})
#find the sums of the columns to determine the number of times each term is used

count_results<-colSums(termmatrix)
count_results
```
